name: Cannon Miner
description:
You ever just wanted to fire a cannon ball, watch it soar through the sky,  and dig deep into the earth? So did I, so I made this game.

Controls:

  • Click, tap, or spacebar to launch and jump.
  • R  - restart
  • Esc - pause

Features:

  • Procedural generation
  • Lots of ores to collect
  • Upgrades
  • Works on mobile
  • The game saves automatically

I don't know if I'll ever finish this project but I would love to hear your thoughts and ideas!

Download the song here.

Thank you to Luis Zuno (@ansimuz) for the cool backdrop.

Thank you to Fadel Haddad for the cannon model.
